CustomField.description: If the User has a Signature setup in his "My Email Settings" this will be shown in the mail. If you do not want this, you can just check the checkbox
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the User has a Signature setup in his "My Email Settings" this will be shown in the mail. If you do not want this, you can just check the checkbox
CustomField.label: Email Hide User Signature
